  • Uses of Element in textui.element

    Subclasses of Element in textui.element
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    SortedListElement
    A UI element representing a sorted (numbered) list of text entries.
    class 
    TextElement
    Represents a text-based UI element that displays formatted paragraphs of text.
    class 
    UnsortedListElement
    A text element that displays a list of items with bullet points.

    Method
    Description
    Element

    Element
    TextElement.insertChild(Element child)
    This element does not support adding child elements.

    Inserts multiple child elements into this element's children list.
    Element
    TextElement.insertChildren(List<Element> children)
    This element does not support adding multiple child elements.

    Element.printScreen()
    Renders the element's content onto its screen representation, including borders and child elements according to the display mode.

    Sets the alignment of items along the cross axis.

    Sets the display mode of this element.

    Sets whether this element should fill the available space.
